snippet: The United Nations called the execution of a convicted murderer in Hanoi after an 18-month pause in the use of the death penalty “a major setback.”
abstract: United Nations says human rights in Vietnam have suffered 'major setback' after execution of convicted murderer, ending 18-month pause in country's use of death penalty.
lead_paragraph: The United Nations called the execution of a convicted murderer in Hanoi after an 18-month pause in the use of the death penalty “a major setback.”

headline.main: U.N. Criticizes Vietnam’s Resumption of Executions
headline.print_headline:
Human Rights Office Criticizes
Vietnam as Executions Resume

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
keywords.name: subject
